caption.p: Number of research articles during the study period with a Mycobacteria tuberculosis research theme in 2016 (A), 2005 (B), and 2000 (C) or a Hepatitis C Virus research theme in 2016 (E), 2005 (F), and 2000 (G). (D,H) show the percentage of articles with Mycobacteria tuberculosis and Hepatitis C Virus research themes, respectively, over time.
